channel.title: IATI website work: 09/07/2020
channel.description: Technical notice: [http://iatistandard.org ](https://t.co/fRtC1mYbZM?amp=1) will be undergoing further updates from 2pm today (UK time) and users may experiences issues with using the site over the next 24 hours. For any questions or help email IATI’s Technical Team at [support@iatistandard.org](mailto:support@iatistandard.org).
